Uses of Class
com.skobbler.ngx.map.SKScreenPoint

  • Packages that use SKScreenPoint 
    Package Description
    com.skobbler.ngx.map
    Constains classses needed to show the map and information on the map.

    • Uses of SKScreenPoint in com.skobbler.ngx.map

      Methods in com.skobbler.ngx.map that return SKScreenPoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SKScreenPoint SKMapSurfaceView.coordinateToPoint(SKCoordinate coordinate)
      Returns the screen position relative to the latitude/longitude coordinates.
      SKScreenPoint SKMapSettings.getCompassPosition()
      Return the screen position for the compass.
      SKScreenPoint SKAnnotation.getOffset()
      Returns the offset of the annotation with image.
      Methods in com.skobbler.ngx.map with parameters of type SKScreenPoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SKMapSurfaceListener.onDoubleTap(SKScreenPoint point)
      Notifies when a double tap was done.
      void SKMapSurfaceListener.onLongPress(SKScreenPoint point)
      Notifies when a long press was done.
      void SKMapSurfaceListener.onMapActionDown(SKScreenPoint point)
      Notifies when a pressed gesture has started.
      void SKMapSurfaceListener.onMapActionUp(SKScreenPoint point)
      Notifies when a pressed gesture has finished.
      void SKMapSurfaceListener.onSingleTap(SKScreenPoint point)
      Notifies when a single tap was made.
      SKCoordinate SKMapSurfaceView.pointToCoordinate(SKScreenPoint point)
      Returns the long/lat position relative to the screen position.
      void SKMapSettings.setCompassPosition(SKScreenPoint compassPosition)
      Set the screen position for the compass.
      void SKAnnotation.setOffset(SKScreenPoint offset)
      Sets the offset for the annotation added using an image.
      void SKMapSurfaceView.zoomInAt(SKScreenPoint point)
      Gradually zooms in to the given screen position
